    D

    DataController - Class in com.madra_soft_power.myapi.controller
    Handles the API Calls with RestController All endpoints for this class are under /api with RequestMapping POST requests are under the endpoint /add-data If successful it will call the service to save the POSTed information GET endpoints defined for specific use cases
    DataController() - Constructor for class com.madra_soft_power.myapi.controller.DataController
     
    DataService - Class in com.madra_soft_power.myapi.service
    Service defines it as a service Works as connector between the Controller and Repo Saves the object passed from the controller to the repo
    DataService() - Constructor for class com.madra_soft_power.myapi.service.DataService
